channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You’ve got less than 5 years to rescue your money from AI and stablecoins. Here’s what to do.
item.description: America’s once-a-century reset is happening at hyperspeed — creating new fortunes and destroying old ones.

item.title: Get ready for an end-of-year rally for stocks, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: Goldman Sachs says it has grown bullish on stocks for the rest of this year, with a supportive economy and Fed rate cuts backstopping the asset class.

item.title: Housing market shows sudden strength as buyers take advantage of falling mortgage rates
item.description: Pending home sales rose to a five-month high in August as lower mortgage rates reeled home buyers back into the housing market.

item.title: ‘He’s the breadwinner’: Does my husband take Social Security at 66 — or wait to get $800 extra at 70?
item.description: “My husband jokes that he will never be able to retire because we do not own a home.”
